name: A Bowl of Dust
description:
Made for a 2 week long Adventure Challenge. Theme:  Historical Fiction

A Bowl of Dust is a short adventure game about an alternate history 1934. Bill and Nellie have to keep themselves safe as the merciless dust bowl approaches their farm.

Once the dust has settled, what will remain of Bill's family?

Oh, and there is a cow.

Story and Sound Design by Clay Aunkst

Controls:

A/D or Arrow Keys to move.

Space or Enter to interact and forward text.

F4 for fullscreen
